_prev_prog_3.Description: (AO1) There are 13 different processes covered by RMP.  AO1, AO2, AO3, ID1, and ID2 are five processes operated by the Shell Higher Olefins Process (SHOP) department.  The AO1 Process includes the production of Alpha Olefin.  Sections 6, 10, and 12 through 15 are implemented as a whole. Section 5 is implemented by the Operating Department. All other sections are implemented by process.

(EOEG2) There are 13 different processes covered by RMP.  EOEG2, EOEG3, and Utilities are three separate processes operated by the E department.  The EOEG2 Process includes the production of Ethylene Oxide and Ethylene Glycol.  Sections 6, 10, and 12 through 15 are implemented as a whole.  Section 5 is implemented by the Operating Department.  All other sections are implemented by process.

(K2) There are 13 different processes covered by RMP.   K2, K3, K4, and K5 are 4 processes operated by the Hydroformylation Ethoxylation (HFE) department.  The K2 Process includes the production of Detergent Range Alcohol.  Sections 6, 10, and 12 through 15 are implemented as a whole.  Section 5 is implemented by the Operating Department.  All other sections are implemented by process.

(Utilities) There are 13 different processes covered by RMP.  EOEG2, EOEG3, and Utilities are three separate processes operated by the E department.  The Utilities process includes chlorine and ammonia (anhydrous) used during water treatment in the Utilities System.  Sections 6, 10, and 12 through 15 are implemented as a whole.  Section 5 is implemented by the Operating Department.  All other sections are implemented by process.

(AO2) There are 13 different processes covered by RMP.  AO1, AO2, AO3, ID1, and ID2 are five processes operated by the Shell Higher Olefins Process (SHOP) department.  The AO2 Process includes the production of Alpha Olefin.  Sections 6, 10, and 12 through 15 are implemented as a whole.  Section 5 is implemented by the Operating Department.  All other sections are implemented by process.

(AO3) There are 13 different processes covered by RMP.  AO1, AO2, AO3, ID1, and ID2 are five processes operated by the Shell Higher Olefins Process (SHOP) department.  The AO3 Process includes the production of Alpha Olefin.  Sections 6, 10, and 12 through 15 are implemented as a whole.  Section 5 is implemented by the Operating Department.  All other sections are implemented by process.

(ID1) There are 13 different processes covered by RMP.  AO1, AO2, AO3, ID1, and ID2 are five processes operated by the Shell Higher Olefins Process (SHOP) department.  The ID1 Process includes the production of Internal Olefin.  Sections 6, 10, and 12 through 15 are implemented as a whole.  Section 5 is implemented by the Operating Department.  All other sections are implemented by process.

(ID2) There are 13 different processes covered by RMP.  AO1, AO2, AO3, ID1, and ID2 are five processes operated by the Shell Higher Olefins Process (SHOP) department.  The ID2 Process includes the production of Internal Olefin.  Sections 6, 10, and 12 through 15 are implemented as a whole.  Section 5 is implemented by the Operating Department.  All other sections are implemented by process.

(K3) There are 13 different processes covered by RMP.  K2, K3, K4, and K5 are 4 processes operated by the Hydroformylation Ethoxylation (HFE) department.  The K3 Process includes the production of Detergent Range Alcohol.  Sections 6, 10, and 12 through 15 are implemented as a whole.  Section 5 is implemented by the Operating Department.  All other sections are implemented by process.

(K4) There are 13 different processes covered by RMP.  K2, K3, K4, and K5 are 4 processes operated by the Hydroformylation Ethoxylation (HFE) department.  The K4 Process includes the production of Detergent Range Alcohol.  Sections 6, 10, and 12 through 15 are implemented as a whole.  Section 5 is implemented by the Operating Department.  All other sections are implemented by process.

(K5) There are 13 different processes covered by RMP.  K2, K3, K4, and K5 are 4 processes operated by the Hydroformylation Ethoxylation (HFE) department.  The K5 Process includes the production of Detergent Range Alcohol.  Sections 6, 10, and 12 through 15 are implemented as a whole.  Section 5 is implemented by the Operating Department.  All other sections are implemented by process.

(EOEG3) There are 13 different processes covered by RMP.  EOEG2, EOEG3, and Utilities are three separate processes operated by the E department.  The EOEG3 Process includes the production of Ethylene Oxide and Ethylene Glycol.  Sections 6, 10, and 12 through 15 are implemented as a whole.  Section 5 is implemented by the Operating Department.  All other sections are implemented by process.

(Logistics) There are 13 different processes covered by RMP.  Logistics is the one process that is operated independently.  The Logistics Process includes railcar loading and storage.  Sections 6, 10, and 12 through 15 are implemented as a whole.  Section 5 is implemented by the Operating Department.  All other sections are implemented by process.
